entry.title: Bitcoin Core 0.10.1 release candidate 2 available
entry.summary: Bitcoin Core 0.10.1rc2 executables have been uploaded to bitcoin.org for testing purposes. The source code can be found in git under the tag 'v0.10.1rc2'. The only change in comparison to rc1 is a fix by Gavin Andresen which keeps mempool consistent during block-reorgs. Wladimir thanked everyone who participated in the gitian build process.
